thread.title: UAE- HTC latest smartphones showcased at roadshows
thread.title_full: UAE- HTC latest smartphones showcased at roadshows | MENAFN.COM

author: Khaleej Times
title: UAE- HTC latest smartphones showcased at roadshows
text: (MENAFN - Khaleej Times)HTC is engaging fans throughout the UAE with an exciting roadshow that is showcasing its latest smartphones. The HTC roadshow features the larger-than-life 5.5 inch screen smartphones from HTC's flagship ranges; the HTC Desire 820G and the HTC One E9 which will be sold at a price of Dh1799 and Dh899 respectively. The HTC roadshow is taking place between August 27 and September 27 at Sharjah City Centre Deira City Centre and Mall of the Emirates in Dubai and Marina Mall in Abu Dhabi. "In addition to the iconic look of the HTC One E9 with new metallic accents and the added dual colours in a seamless unibody of the HTC Desire 820G both phones also give customers a better view of their emails and apps and makes sharing videos with friends even more enjoyable. In fact HTC's enlarged screens bring videos and games to life with eye-popping graphics" said Neeraj Seth head of marketing HTC MEA. -
